name: Neon (itch) (Rakanishu)
description:
Authors: Rakanishu, Dr.Tr1gger
Creation Date: End 2016
Latest Update: 12 october 2020
Description: This map is an official Serious Sam: Revolution map designed by myself (Rakanishu). Enemies were set up by Dr.Tr1gger and I decided to backport this map to SS:TSE in July 2022. This is a sci-fi themed map using Nifran's Textures and The Pasch's music.

Features

- Sci-fi Themed survival map
- Original music
- Creative boss fight

Medals
  • Bronze time: 1 minutes 40
  • Silver time: 4 minutes 00
  • Gold time: 7 minutes 30
Available games:

Serious Sam: The Second Encounter  
Serious Sam: Revolution (officially)

Special thanks to Twilight Wings Studio without which I couldn't backport the map so easily.
